type.name: org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoMerge
type.description: Task to merge multiple execution data files into one.

method.name: executionData
method.description:
Adds execution data files to be merged.
param:files one or more files to merge

method.name: executionData
method.description:
Adds execution data generated by a task to the list of those to merge. Only tasks with a JacocoTaskExtension will be included; all others will be ignored.
param:tasks one or more tasks to merge

method.name: executionData
method.description:
Adds execution data generated by the given tasks to the list of those merged. Only tasks with a JacocoTaskExtension will be included; all others will be ignored.
param:tasks one or more tasks to merge

method.name: getDestinationFile
method.description: File to write merged execution data to.

method.name: getExecutionData
method.description: Collection of execution data files to merge.

property.name: destinationFile
property.description: File to write merged execution data to.

property.name: executionData
property.description: Collection of execution data files to merge.
